create_contact.description: Create a new contact in your OpenPhone workspace

props.name: firstName
props.description: The contact's first name

props.name: lastName
props.description: The contact's last name

props.name: company
props.description: The contact's company name

props.name: role
props.description: The contact's role

props.name: emails
props.description: List of email addresses for the contact

props.name: name
props.description: Label for this email address (e.g., "work", "personal")

props.name: value
props.description: The email address

props.name: phoneNumbers
props.description: List of phone numbers for the contact

props.name: name
props.description: Label for this phone number (e.g., "mobile", "work")

props.name: value
props.description: The phone number (preferably in E.164 format)

props.name: customFields
props.description: Custom fields for the contact

props.name: key
props.description: The identifying key for the custom field

props.name: value
props.description: The value for the custom field

props.name: createdByUserId
props.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the contact (US123abc format)

props.name: source
props.description: The contact\

props.name: sourceUrl
props.description: A link to the contact in the source system

props.name: externalId
props.description: A unique identifier from an external system

get_call_summary.description: Retrieve an AI-generated summary of a specific call by ID. Call summaries are only available on OpenPhone Business plan.

send_message.description: Send SMS/MMS from your OpenPhone number to a recipient

props.name: content
props.description: The text content of the message to be sent (1-1600 characters)

props.name: from
props.description: OpenPhone number to send from (E.164 format: +15555555555) or phone number ID (PN123abc)

props.name: to
props.description: Recipient phone numbers in E.164 format (e.g., +15555555555)

props.name: phoneNumber
props.description: Phone number in E.164 format

props.name: userId
props.description: The unique identifier of the OpenPhone user sending the message. If not provided, defaults to the phone number owner.

props.name: setInboxStatus
props.description: Set the status of the related OpenPhone inbox conversation

update_contact.description: Update an existing contact in your OpenPhone workspace

props.name: firstName
props.description: The contact's first name

props.name: lastName
props.description: The contact's last name

props.name: company
props.description: The contact's company name

props.name: role
props.description: The contact's role

props.name: emails
props.description: List of email addresses for the contact (replaces existing emails)

props.name: name
props.description: Label for this email address (e.g., "work", "personal")

props.name: value
props.description: The email address (set to empty to remove)

props.name: id
props.description: The unique identifier for existing email field (required for updates)

props.name: phoneNumbers
props.description: List of phone numbers for the contact (replaces existing phone numbers)

props.name: name
props.description: Label for this phone number (e.g., "mobile", "work")

props.name: value
props.description: The phone number (set to empty to remove, preferably in E.164 format)

props.name: id
props.description: The unique identifier for existing phone number field (required for updates)

props.name: customFields
props.description: Custom fields for the contact

props.name: key
props.description: The identifying key for the custom field

props.name: value
props.description: The value for the custom field (set to empty to remove)

props.name: id
props.description: The unique identifier for the custom field (required for updates)

props.name: source
props.description: Update the contact's source

props.name: sourceUrl
props.description: Update the link to the contact in the source system

props.name: externalId
props.description: Update the unique identifier from an external system

call_recording_completed.description: Fires when a call recording finishes. Useful for post-transcription or archival workflows.

incoming_call_completed.description: Fires when an incoming call is completed. Includes voicemail data if available.

incoming_message_received.description: Fires when a new SMS/MMS message is received.

outgoing_call_completed.description: Fires when an outbound call ends. Useful for call logging.

outgoing_message_delivered.description: Fires when an outbound message is delivered successfully. Useful for message confirmation workflows.
